title: Client Bug
body: The game literally wont connect until 3 minutes and then it loads as im getting the remake...

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like this may be an issue on your end, but lets rule out some other things also.

* Have you attempted a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?
* Are you using a wired or a wireless connection?
* Are you sure your system meets the minimum required specs to run league?
